screens.name: Main Explorer View
screens.purpose: Primary interface for framework exploration with dual-pane master-detail layout enabling self-service learning
screens.layout: Dual-pane (master-detail) with collapsible navigation tree and tabbed detail content

screens.name: Search Results Page
screens.purpose: Instant keyword search across all framework components with relevance ranking
screens.layout: Full-width search results with filters and preview cards

screens.name: Stage-Filtered View
screens.purpose: Show only tools relevant to current workflow stage (Discovery, Prototype, Implementation, etc.)
screens.layout: Same dual-pane layout as SCR-001, but with filtered navigation tree
entry_points: Stage Filter dropdown in SCR-001 header

screens.name: Favorites Page
screens.purpose: Quick access panel for bookmarked frequently-used tools
screens.layout: Grid view of favorited items with drag-and-drop reordering
exit_points: Click item -> navigates to SCR-001 with item selected

screens.name: Comparison View
screens.purpose: Side-by-side comparison of similar tools with decision guidance
screens.layout: Two-column table comparing features, performance, use cases
entry_points: Compare button in detail pane (when related components exist)

screens.name: Component Detail Modal
screens.purpose: Full-screen modal for deep-dive into component documentation
screens.layout: Tabbed interface with sticky header and scrollable content

screens.name: Settings Panel
screens.purpose: User preferences (theme, display options, keyboard shortcuts)

screens.name: Mobile Explorer View
screens.purpose: Responsive mobile layout for iPad/phone browsing during meetings
screens.layout: Collapsible drawer for navigation, full-width detail view
entry_points: Same as SCR-001 on mobile devices
